description.raw:
Edit properties on property panel and see changes in real time, both on desktop and mobile.

`SCENE`: not yet

`MODELS`

* `Name`: not editable

* `Static`: not editable

* `Pose`: editable

`LINKS`

* `Name`: not editable

* `Self Collide`: editable

* `Gravity`: editable

* `Kinematic`: editable

* `Canonical`: not editable

* `Pose`: not yet

* `Inertial`: not yet

`JOINTS`: not yet

`LIGHTS`

* `Name`: not editable

* `Pose`: editable

* `Direction`: editable

* `Diffuse`: editable

* `Specular`: editable, changes not visible

* `Range`: editable

* `Attenuation`: editable, changes visible only for `Constant`
